statements: DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND (revenue > 10000 OR expenses < 5000);
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE trend = 'up' AND sentiment IS NULL;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE sentiment = 'positive' AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date < '2022-01-01';
